Author: ArkhamBrothers
Text: I feel like mine is sort of both?? I adore seeing the number go down knowing I control what I do or don’t eat. Or what I purge because I’m an idiot and -did- eat.  Im down to 121.2 as of today but my UGW is what I used to be, 95 lbs. I was 87 but at my age that’s impossible to get back down to, I’ll stick with 95.
